    接口 说明
    net.minecraftforge.client.IRenderContextHandler
    TODO remove in 1.13. This has never been used
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.IFuelHandler
    set your item's Item.getItemBurnTime(ItemStack) or subscribe to FurnaceFuelBurnTimeEvent instead.

  • 方法 
    方法 说明
    net.minecraftforge.client.ForgeHooksClient.registerTESRItemStack​(Item, int, Class<? extends TileEntity>)
    Will be removed as soon as possible. See Item.getTileEntityItemStackRenderer().
    net.minecraftforge.client.model.ItemTextureQuadConverter.convertTexture​(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, TextureAtlasSprite, TextureAtlasSprite, float, EnumFacing, int)
    use ItemTextureQuadConverter.convertTexture(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, TextureAtlasSprite, TextureAtlasSprite, float, EnumFacing, int, int)
    net.minecraftforge.client.model.ItemTextureQuadConverter.convertTextureHorizontal​(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, TextureAtlasSprite, TextureAtlasSprite, float, EnumFacing, int)
    use ItemTextureQuadConverter.convertTextureHorizontal(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, TextureAtlasSprite, TextureAtlasSprite, float, EnumFacing, int, int)
    net.minecraftforge.client.model.ItemTextureQuadConverter.convertTextureVertical​(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, TextureAtlasSprite, TextureAtlasSprite, float, EnumFacing, int)
    use ItemTextureQuadConverter.convertTextureVertical(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, TextureAtlasSprite, TextureAtlasSprite, float, EnumFacing, int, int)
    net.minecraftforge.client.model.ItemTextureQuadConverter.genQuad​(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, float, float, float, float, float, TextureAtlasSprite, EnumFacing, int)
    use ItemTextureQuadConverter.genQuad(VertexFormat, TRSRTransformation, float, float, float, float, float, TextureAtlasSprite, EnumFacing, int, int)
    net.minecraftforge.client.model.pipeline.LightUtil.getItemConsumer()
    net.minecraftforge.client.model.pipeline.LightUtil.getTessellator()
    net.minecraftforge.client.settings.KeyModifier.isActive()
    use KeyModifier.isActive(IKeyConflictContext)
    net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.CapabilityManager.register​(Class<T>, Capability.IStorage<T>, Class<? extends T>)
    Use the overload that takes a factory instead of a class. You can easily do this by passing a constructor reference (MyImpl::new instead of MyImpl.class). TODO remove in 1.13.
    net.minecraftforge.common.config.IFieldWrapper.setupConfiguration​(Configuration, String, String, boolean, boolean)
    net.minecraftforge.common.crafting.CraftingHelper.findFiles​(ModContainer, String, Function<Path, Boolean>, BiFunction<Path, Path, Boolean>)
    Use CraftingHelper.findFiles(ModContainer, String, Function, BiFunction, boolean, boolean) instead.
    net.minecraftforge.common.FarmlandWaterManager.addCustomTicket​(World, T, ChunkPos...)
    net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeHooks.onThrowableImpact​(EntityThrowable, RayTraceResult)
    use ForgeEventFactory.onProjectileImpact(EntityThrowable, RayTraceResult)
    net.minecraftforge.common.model.TRSRTransformation.from​(ItemTransformVec3f)
    net.minecraftforge.common.model.TRSRTransformation.toItemTransform()
    net.minecraftforge.common.ticket.SimpleTicket.setBackend​(ITicketManager<T>)
    net.minecraftforge.common.util.CompoundDataFixer.process​(IFixType, NBTTagCompound, int)
    net.minecraftforge.common.util.CompoundDataFixer.registerFix​(IFixType, IFixableData)
    net.minecraftforge.common.util.CompoundDataFixer.registerWalker​(FixTypes, IDataWalker)
    net.minecraftforge.common.util.EnumHelper.addRarity​(String, TextFormatting, String)
    use IRarity instead
    net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.AnvilRepairEvent.getLeft()
    net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.AnvilRepairEvent.getOutput()
    net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.AnvilRepairEvent.getRight()
    net.minecraftforge.event.ForgeEventFactory.canEntitySpawn​(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float)
    use ForgeEventFactory.canEntitySpawn(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic) instead
    net.minecraftforge.event.ForgeEventFactory.canEntitySpawnSpawner​(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float)
    Use ForgeEventFactory.canEntitySpawnSpawner(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic)
    net.minecraftforge.event.ForgeEventFactory.doSpecialSpawn​(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float)
    Use ForgeEventFactory.canEntitySpawnSpawner(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic)
    net.minecraftforge.event.terraingen.DecorateBiomeEvent.getPos()
    use DecorateBiomeEvent.getChunkPos() or DecorateBiomeEvent.Decorate.getPlacementPos() instead.
    net.minecraftforge.event.terraingen.TerrainGen.decorate​(World, Random, BlockPos, DecorateBiomeEvent.Decorate.EventType)
    net.minecraftforge.event.world.BlockEvent.PlaceEvent.getItemInHand()
    net.minecraftforge.event.world.ChunkWatchEvent.getChunk()
    net.minecraftforge.fluids.BlockFluidBase.getStateFromMeta​(int)
    net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidRegistry.getRegisteredFluidIDs()
    net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidUtil.tryEmptyContainerAndStow​(ItemStack, IFluidHandler, IItemHandler, int, EntityPlayer)
    use FluidUtil.tryEmptyContainerAndStow(ItemStack, IFluidHandler, IItemHandler, int, EntityPlayer, boolean)
    net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidUtil.tryFillContainerAndStow​(ItemStack, IFluidHandler, IItemHandler, int, EntityPlayer)
    use FluidUtil.tryFillContainerAndStow(ItemStack, IFluidHandler, IItemHandler, int, EntityPlayer, boolean)
    net.minecraftforge.fluids.UniversalBucket.getFilledBucket​(UniversalBucket, Fluid)
    use the NBT-sensitive version FluidUtil.getFilledBucket(FluidStack)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.client.FMLClientHandler.displayMissingMods​(Object)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.client.GuiScrollingList.func_27256_c​(int, int)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.client.GuiScrollingList.func_27258_a​(boolean)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.client.registry.RenderingRegistry.registerEntityRenderingHandler​(Class<? extends Entity>, Render<? extends Entity>)
    use the factory version during Preinitialization. TODO Will be removed in 1.11.
    net.minecraftforge.fml.client.SplashProgress.pause()
    not a stable API, will break, don't use this yet
    net.minecraftforge.fml.client.SplashProgress.resume()
    not a stable API, will break, don't use this yet
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event.FMLPreInitializationEvent.getFMLSigningCertificates()
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.bus()
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.getFMLLogger()
    Not used in FML, Mods use your own logger, see FMLPreInitializationEvent.getModLog()
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLLog.fine​(String, Object...)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLLog.finer​(String, Object...)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLLog.getLogger()
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLLog.info​(String, Object...)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLLog.log​(String, Level, String, Object...)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLLog.severe​(String, Object...)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.FMLLog.warning​(String, Object...)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoadController.checkErrors()
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoadController.checkErrorsAfterAvailable()
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.Loader.computeDependencies​(String, Set<ArtifactVersion>, List<ArtifactVersion>, List<ArtifactVersion>)
    use DependencyParser.parseDependencies(String)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.network.handshake.NetworkDispatcher.deregister​(ChannelHandlerContext, ChannelPromise)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.network.internal.NetworkModHolder.NetworkChecker.check​(Map<String, String>, Side)
    use NetworkModHolder.NetworkChecker.checkCompatible(Map, Side)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.ObfuscationReflectionHelper.getPrivateValue​(Class<? super E>, E, int)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.ObfuscationReflectionHelper.remapFieldNames​(String, String...)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.ObfuscationReflectionHelper.setPrivateValue​(Class<? super T>, T, E, int)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.EntityRegistry.EntityRegistration.getEntityClass()
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.GameRegistry.getFuelValue​(ItemStack)
    use ForgeEventFactory.getItemBurnTime(ItemStack)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.GameRegistry.getFuelValueLegacy​(ItemStack)
    use ForgeEventFactory.getItemBurnTime(ItemStack)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.GameRegistry.registerFuelHandler​(IFuelHandler)
    set your item's Item.getItemBurnTime(ItemStack) or subscribe to FurnaceFuelBurnTimeEvent instead.
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.GameRegistry.registerTileEntity​(Class<? extends TileEntity>, String)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.VillagerRegistry.getById​(int)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.VillagerRegistry.getId​(VillagerRegistry.VillagerProfession)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.ZipperUtil.backupWorld​(String, String)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.ReflectionHelper.findField​(Class<?>, String...)
    use ReflectionHelper.findField(Class, String, String)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.ReflectionHelper.getPrivateValue​(Class<? super E>, E, int)
    net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.ReflectionHelper.setPrivateValue​(Class<? super T>, T, E, int)
    net.minecraftforge.oredict.ShapedOreRecipe.getHeight()
    net.minecraftforge.oredict.ShapedOreRecipe.getWidth()
    net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistry.getRaw​(int)
    net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistry.getValues()
    use ForgeRegistry.getValuesCollection() to avoid copying
    net.minecraftforge.registries.GameData.checkPrefix​(String)
    Use GameData.checkPrefix(String, boolean).
    net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistry.getValues()
    use IForgeRegistry.getValuesCollection()
    net.minecraftforge.server.command.ChunkGenWorker.getStartMessage()
    net.minecraftforge.server.ForgeTimeTracker.getTileTimings()
    To be removed in 1.13 - Implementation has been moved
    net.minecraftforge.server.ForgeTimeTracker.trackEnd​(TileEntity)
    To be removed in 1.13 - Implementation has been moved
    net.minecraftforge.server.ForgeTimeTracker.trackStart​(TileEntity)
    To be removed in 1.13 - Implementation has been moved
    net.minecraftforge.server.timings.ForgeTimings.getRawTimingData()
    Added for compatibility, remove in 1.13

    use TRSRTransformation.from(ItemTransformVec3f)
    net.minecraftforge.common.util.BlockSnapshot​(int, BlockPos, String, String, int, int, NBTTagCompound)
    use BlockSnapshot(int, BlockPos, ResourceLocation, int, int, NBTTagCompound)
    net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingSpawnEvent.CheckSpawn​(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, boolean)
    Use {@link CheckSpawn##CheckSpawn(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic)} with a spawner instance, or null if not a spawner CheckSpawn is fired when an Entity is about to be spawned.
    net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingSpawnEvent.SpecialSpawn​(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float)
    Use SpecialSpawn(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic) with originating spawner instance or null
    net.minecraftforge.event.terraingen.DecorateBiomeEvent​(World, Random, BlockPos)

    net.minecraftforge.event.terraingen.DecorateBiomeEvent.Pre​(World, Random, BlockPos)
